name: Snow Cloak
text:
Counter target spell, activated ability or triggered ability.
If {r} was spent to cast this spell, earthshake 1. 
If {g} was spent to cast this spell, earthshake 1.
(Put a +1/+1 counter on target land you control. You may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.)
